name: BabyWatchPlus
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Enable the skill in your Alexa App, and you can check-in on your baby by simply saying “Alexa, show the baby camera.”

Please note that you are only able to view video steam and listen to audio from your Baby Camera; you will not be able to speak to people through your Echo Show.

To get started, simply tap the “Enable” button, link your Alexa account to your Baby Watch Plus account. After linking your account and discovering your cameras in your Alexa account, you can start streaming video to your Echo Show or Echo Spot with commands like:
- "Alexa, show the baby camera"

To stop your camera from streaming video, you can say:
- "Alexa, stop the baby camera"

When using this Skill, you need to specify the name of the desired camera. The name is equivalent to the device name of your camera and can be found and configured in the app
